response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 9500}
